NK036(chi)013:1: // rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang gsum bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)013:2: kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen dang //
NK036(chi)013:3: rgya gar mkhas pa lnga la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK036(chi)013:4: bla med dbang gi don rnams rab phye bar //
NK036(chi)013:5: lag len rim pa gsal bar bshad par bya //
NK036(chi)013:6: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don la rtse gcig tu mos shing /
NK036(chi)013:7: skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma la bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pas /
NK036(chi)013:8: rgyud smin par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bar byed pa la /
NK036(chi)013:9: dbang gi rim pa du ma zhig gsungs kyang /
NK036(chi)013:10: 'dir spros pa'i rnam par rtog pa bcad nas /
NK036(chi)013:11: rang gi sems nyid rig pa'i snying po mngon sum du mthong bar byed pa'i dbang bzhi ste /
NK036(chi)013:16: dang po spyir rgyud sde bzhi'am /
NK036(chi)013:17: mdo sgyu 'phrul gnyis kyi dbang mo che'am /
NK036(chi)013:18: 'di nyid kyi spros bcas kyi dbang chen po thob pa'am /
NK036(chi)013:19: yang na lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug gis mdzad
NK036(chi)013:20: pa'i spros bcas kyi dbang bsdus pa mngon du thob
NK036(chi)013:21: par byas la / theg pa rim dgu'i lta ba'i don dus gcig la rtogs shing /
NK036(chi)013:22: lus la nus pa bzhag cing /
NK036(chi)013:23: lus kyi dri ma dag par byas nas /
NK036(chi)013:24: gnyis pa spros pa med pa'i dbang bskur ba ni /
NK036(chi)013:25: gnas khang dben par man+dala dri sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab la zlum por bskor te /
NK036(chi)013:26: de'i dbus su rdul tshon gyi bum pa snal ma rab tu legs pa dmar po /
NK036(chi)013:27: kha rgyan dang mgul chings dang bcas pa bris la /
NK036(chi)013:28: zlum pa'i bla re tshon lnga'i ra bas bskor /
NK036(chi)013:29: de'i nub phyogs su shing gi khri'i steng du rin
NK036(chi)013:30: po che'i bum pa gas pa dang chag pa dang
NK036(chi)013:31: zhom pa med pa gsum gyi nang du sman sna
NK036(chi)013:32: tshogs pa dang / 'bru sna tshogs pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:33: rin po che sna tshogs pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:34: 'o ma dang mar la sogs pas legs par bkang
NK036(chi)013:35: la 'bras bu dang me tog can gyi shing gis
NK036(chi)013:37: ras dmar po'i dri ma med cing kha tshar ma nyams pa gsum gyis mgul pa bcing ngo //
NK036(chi)013:38: de ltar bum pa re re'i steng du me long gsum dang /
NK036(chi)013:40: man shel gsum bzhag par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:41: mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas kyang bskor /
NK036(chi)013:45: dpal e ka dza ti dang /
NK036(chi)013:47: gzhi bdag la sogs pa'i gtor ma dang /
NK036(chi)013:48: mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa bsham mo //
NK036(chi)013:49: de nas slob dpon rang nyid rgyud rnam par dag
NK036(chi)013:50: par bya ba'i don bla ma brgyud pa la gsol
NK036(chi)013:51: ba gdab cing yid kyi dbang blang /
NK036(chi)013:52: yi ge gsum mang du bzlas shing gnyis su med pa'i don bsgom /
NK036(chi)013:53: bum pa rnams kyang kun tu bzang po'i sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin /
NK036(chi)013:57: +aahmh'u dang a li ka li brgya tsam gyis rgyas gdab bo //
NK036(chi)013:58: de dag ni slob dpon gyis sngon du bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:59: de nas slob ma rnams la dri bzang po'i chus
NK036(chi)013:60: a zhes brjod cing khrus byas la gral la 'khod
NK036(chi)013:64: lus ngag tha mal gyi zhen pa spangs dang /
NK036(chi)013:66: bsre ba rnams ni sngon 'gro'i cho ga ste /
NK036(chi)013:68: bi ma la yis dung yig can du gsungs pa /
NK036(chi)013:69: sde snod rin po che las ni mngon pa'i sde /
NK036(chi)013:70: pha rol phyi na dang sngags las ni sngags yin no //
NK036(chi)013:71: gsang sngags phyi nang gnyis las nang pa ste /
NK036(chi)013:72: de nyid las ni rim dgu kun gyi rtse //
NK036(chi)013:73: theg rgyal a ti yo ga gsang ba chen po'i gzhung //
NK036(chi)013:74: de nyid sde ru phye na rnam gsum ste //
NK036(chi)013:75: sems sde klong sde man ngag sde dang gsum //
NK036(chi)013:76: man ngag sde nyid la yang rnam gsum ste //
NK036(chi)013:77: kha gtam kha 'thor rgyud kyi rang bzhin gsum //
NK036(chi)013:81: sngags las rnal 'byor bla na med pa /
NK036(chi)013:84: a ti gsum las a ti yo ga /
NK036(chi)013:85: de la sems sde klong sde man ngag gi sde dang gsum las man ngag /
NK036(chi)013:86: de la phyi skor lus lta bu tha snyad ston pa /
NK036(chi)013:87: nang skor snying lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:88: gsang skor mig lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:89: yang gsang lus sems rdzogs pa lta bu dang bzhi las /
NK036(chi)013:90: 'dir phyi ma bla na med pa rgyud bcu bdun
NK036(chi)013:91: man ngag brgya dang bcu dgu las kyang snying por
NK036(chi)013:92: phyung ba / yang gsang yi ge dmar po ma smin pa smin par byed pa'i dbang bzhi las /
NK036(chi)013:93: spros bcas gong du song nas spros pa med pa'i
NK036(chi)013:94: dbang ngag rnam par dag par byed pa ngag gi
NK036(chi)013:95: nus pa ston par byed pa yin no //
NK036(chi)013:96: 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs ni chos spyi nas bstan pa
NK036(chi)013:97: lta bur skyon du ma dang bcas pa yin la
NK036(chi)013:98: / 'di nyid nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams ni rgyu 'dod sred yin pas /
NK036(chi)013:99: skyes bu skom pas gdungs pa la tsh+wa chu blud pa lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:100: dug gi lo ma dang sbrul gyis zin pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:101: spu gri'i so dang mtshungs pa yin la /
NK036(chi)013:102: khams gsum du gnas pa thams cad sbrul smyug dong du btsud pa 'dra ba dang /
NK036(chi)013:103: 'dab chags rnyi la zin pa lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:104: ri dwags rgya la tshud pa lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:105: phyi'i rgya mtshor gzings thag chad pa lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:106: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i 'phrang du lam nor ba lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:107: skyes bu gsod pa'i gshed ma'i dkyil du tshud pa lta bu /
NK036(chi)013:108: rab tu brgal ba'i dka' ba'i 'dam rdzab chen por bying ba lta bu /
NK036(chi)013:109: me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du sbrang bu tshud
NK036(chi)013:110: pa lta bu la sogs pa nyes pa du ma
NK036(chi)013:111: dang ldan par gsungs pa rtogs par byas la /
NK036(chi)013:112: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dran
NK036(chi)013:113: pas rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don myur du
NK036(chi)013:114: mthong bar bya'o snyam du byang chub kyi sems sbyong
NK036(chi)013:115: bdun po sngar bstan pa ltar bsgom par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:116: de nas lus ngag tha mal gyi zhen pa spang ba'i don du /
NK036(chi)013:117: rig 'dzin bla ma brgyud pa rgyal ba sras bcas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsgoms la /
NK036(chi)013:118: phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul sdig pa bshags /
NK036(chi)013:119: bsod nams la ni rjes yi rang //
NK036(chi)013:120: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul /
NK036(chi)013:121: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab /
NK036(chi)013:122: skyabs su 'gro sems bskyed cing sdom pa bzung /
NK036(chi)013:124: de rnams ngag tu rgyas bsdus ci rigs pa gzhan dang mthun par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:125: de nas gsang sngags kyis skyed rim gang yang rung ba bsgoms la /
NK036(chi)013:126: lus lha ngag sngags sems chos nyid du nges shing bskyed de /
NK036(chi)013:127: tshogs byin brlabs yan chod bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:128: de nas spros med kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK036(chi)013:129: gser la sogs pa'i man+dala phul la tshig 'di brjod do //
NK036(chi)013:130: kye ma rdo rje 'dzin lha la //
NK036(chi)013:131: bdag ni skal ldan snying gi bu //
NK036(chi)013:132: dad pas rab tu bzhugs par 'tshal //
NK036(chi)013:133: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po yi //
NK036(chi)013:134: dbang bskur nang du 'jug lags pas //
NK036(chi)013:135: dpa' bo rdo rje bla ma yis //
NK036(chi)013:136: rang gi sems kyi gnas lugs kyi //
NK036(chi)013:137: a ti'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol //
NK036(chi)013:138: bdag ni yang dag 'dir zhugs nas //
NK036(chi)013:139: slar yang ldog par mi bgyid do //
NK036(chi)013:141: slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa ni 'di skad do //
NK036(chi)013:142: e ma bu khyod skal ba bzang //
NK036(chi)013:143: bskal bzang byang chub sems chen po //
NK036(chi)013:144: sngon chad rang bzhin rdzogs pa yi //
NK036(chi)013:145: dkyil 'khor nyid du ma zhugs pas //
NK036(chi)013:146: do nub khyod la bstan par bya //
NK036(chi)013:147: sems kyi rtog pa kun sol la //
NK036(chi)013:148: 'jig rten bcings pa las grol gyis //
NK036(chi)013:149: 'di la spang blang tha snyad bral //
NK036(chi)013:150: rigs dang rgyu rnams sbyong ba yi //
NK036(chi)013:151: lus ngag bde ba'i rten yin pas //
NK036(chi)013:152: deng nas brtsams te slar ma ldog /
NK036(chi)013:154: de nas bla ma dang bsre ba ni mdun gyi
NK036(chi)013:155: nam mkha' rin po che'i khri dang pad+ma nyi zla'i
NK036(chi)013:156: steng du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo
NK036(chi)013:157: rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag
NK036(chi)013:158: gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril bu can rgyud
NK036(chi)013:159: las gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:160: bla ma brgyud pa rnams bsgoms la sems ma yengs
NK036(chi)013:161: par gtad mthar gsol ba gdab pas 'od zer kha
NK036(chi)013:162: dog lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas /
NK036(chi)013:163: rang la thim par bsgom pa ni bsre ba thun mong ma yin pa ste /
NK036(chi)013:164: rdzogs pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyas 'debs pa zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:167: ngag dag par bya ba dang /
NK036(chi)013:169: rgyas gdab cing ngo sprad pa'o //
NK036(chi)013:170: dang po ni ngag la nus pa 'jog pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:171: ngag rang dag la 'gro ba'i don yin te /
NK036(chi)013:172: dpon slob kun so so'i lus bde bar bcos la /
NK036(chi)013:173: ngag tu sgra che ba ma yin chung ba ma
NK036(chi)013:174: yin par a a a zhes brjod cing yid a
NK036(chi)013:175: la gtad pa zhag gcig tu brjod par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:176: nub gcig la byed pa'i dbang du byas na /
NK036(chi)013:178: de nas nub gnyis pa la a li'i tshogs tshang bar brjod pa bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:179: 'di'i dus na slob dpon gyis a rkyang pa'i dus
NK036(chi)013:180: na bu yis a brjod pas rtsa thams cad kha
NK036(chi)013:181: bye ste / a thams cad thol thol rang byung /
NK036(chi)013:182: de la 'od kyi gong bu rnams las 'od 'phros
NK036(chi)013:183: pas rang bzhin kyi kun tu bzang po yab yum
NK036(chi)013:185: kun bzang yab yum sbyor bas byang chub sems 'od
NK036(chi)013:186: lnga'i rnam pas lus mgo mjug rgyas par gyur pa
NK036(chi)013:187: la blo bzhag / 'di'i dus rna ba'i rlung sgra 'byung ba'i rtsa btsir ro //
NK036(chi)013:188: de ltar slob ma rang yang bsgom du gzhug go //
NK036(chi)013:189: bcug pas nyams su myong ba khyad par can skye bar 'gyur nges so //
NK036(chi)013:190: des na +aa li'i tshig brjod pa'i dus na de
NK036(chi)013:191: nyid rtsa rnams kyi nang nas rang byung gi yi
NK036(chi)013:192: ge rnams rang byung bas rang gi rtsa gnas nas
NK036(chi)013:193: kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra si li li byung
NK036(chi)013:195: ka li'i dus na brjod pa'i yi ge dag phyir
NK036(chi)013:196: 'don la rang gi phung po'i nang na yi ges
NK036(chi)013:197: mer gyis khengs pa la blo bzhag go //
NK036(chi)013:198: de nas skal ldan la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
NK036(chi)013:199: lus gcer mor phyung la bum pa'i chu dang sin d+hu ra'i thig le gcig spyi bor byas la /
NK036(chi)013:200: ngag tu zhes drag por brjod du gzhug /
NK036(chi)013:201: slob dpon gyis mgrin pa'i 'phar rtsa gtems /
NK036(chi)013:202: 'di'i dus na lus 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang /
NK036(chi)013:204: sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba nyid 'byung ba yin no //
NK036(chi)013:205: de nas slob ma'i lus dkar po chen po gcig tu dmigs la chos nyid kyis rgyas gdab /
NK036(chi)013:206: de nas bum pa gcig gi chu thigs gcig dang
NK036(chi)013:207: sin d+hu ra'i thig le mgrin par byas la ngag
NK036(chi)013:208: tu +aah+aahzhesa drag shul dang bcas brjod du gzhug /
NK036(chi)013:209: slob dpon gyis mchan khung gi rtsa gtems /
NK036(chi)013:210: bu'i shes pa nam mkhar drang /
NK036(chi)013:211: 'di ltar byas pas lus bde ba dang /
NK036(chi)013:213: sems rab tu gsal ba dag 'byung /
NK036(chi)013:214: de nasabla mas bu'i lus a dmar po shin tu
NK036(chi)013:215: che ba gcig dmigs la chos nyid kyis rgyas gdab
NK036(chi)013:216: / de nas bum pa gcig gi chu thigs pa
NK036(chi)013:217: gcig dang sin d+hu ra'i thig le snying gar byas
NK036(chi)013:218: / te / ngag tu h+aum h+aum zhes shin tu ring bar brjod du gzhug /
NK036(chi)013:221: shes pa 'byung ba la gtad pa ni /
NK036(chi)013:222: me sum mdor bsgom thig le bzhu bde ba bsgom pa'o //
NK036(chi)013:223: de nas bu'i lus h+aum sngon po chen po zhig tu dmigs la mthar chos nyid kyi rgyas gdab /
NK036(chi)013:224: yi ge rnams slob ma la bstims la /
NK036(chi)013:225: snga ma bum pa gsum gyi chu gnas gsum du
NK036(chi)013:226: byugs pa'i dus su rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas
NK036(chi)013:227: ngag tu chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o //
NK036(chi)013:234: spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral ba'o //
NK036(chi)013:235: zhes pa'i sgra byung bas bu yang de nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur par bsam la brjod do //
NK036(chi)013:236: rtsa gtems pa gsum pa ni /
NK036(chi)013:237: mgrin pa'i rtsa rba rlabs kyis lus g.yo ba med cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:238: mchan khung gi rtsa ni ngag rang rdol ba dang /
NK036(chi)013:240: lte ba'i rtsa ni bde ba chen po rang bzhin gyis skye ba'i rtsa ste /
NK036(chi)013:241: kun tu bzang po'i sku gsung thugs rang la gnas pa'i don ngo sprod pa'o //
NK036(chi)013:242: de nas rgyas gdab pa ni /
NK036(chi)013:243: brjod pa las 'das pa'i don de skal ldan gyi blo la gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
NK036(chi)013:244: dngos po gang la yang rang bzhin med pa'o //
NK036(chi)013:248: ya ma barla yin pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:255: yang kun rdzob tu chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:258: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:259: bar snang gi glog lta bu dang /
NK036(chi)013:260: myur byed kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dpe du mas mtshon pa bstan par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:261: de nas lus ngag yid gsum rdzogs pa chen po
NK036(chi)013:262: stong pa nyid du gzhugs pa'i phyir nang stong pa
NK036(chi)013:263: nyid du dar gcig bsgom du gzhug /
NK036(chi)013:264: de nyid kyi don la bskul ba'i tshig tu yang 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:265: chos rnams thams cad stong zhing bdag med la //
NK036(chi)013:266: dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:267: chos kyi dbyings nyid spros dang bral ba la //
NK036(chi)013:268: spros pa'i tshig phyir 'brengs pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:269: rang rig ye shes 'dod cing chags pa la //
NK036(chi)013:270: 'dod cing zhen pa'i blo 'di yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:271: snying po don gyi ye shes rang shar la //
NK036(chi)013:272: gzhan byung rtsol sgrub byed pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:273: sems nyid skye shi gnyis las 'das pa la //
NK036(chi)013:274: skye 'gags gnyis su 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:275: 'bras bu rang rdzogs smon lam bral ba la //
NK036(chi)013:276: rnam dpyod dus la ltos pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:277: bde sdug thams cad rig pa'i cho 'phrul la //
NK036(chi)013:278: bde sdug gnyis su lta ba yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:279: kun tu bzang po rang la gnas pa la //
NK036(chi)013:280: gzhan du yi dam tshol ba yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:281: bdag nyid ye sangs rgyas pa yin pa la //
NK036(chi)013:282: ngan song gsum du 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:283: 'khor ba ngan song rol pa ye shes la //
NK036(chi)013:284: yang dag sangs rgyas 'dod pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:285: dug lnga ma spangs rang byung chen po la //
NK036(chi)013:286: nyon mongs lnga por 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:287: 'khrul pa'i snang ba chos sku bzhag pa la //
NK036(chi)013:288: dngos po bdag tu 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:289: theg pa rim dgu rang la shar ba la //
NK036(chi)013:290: so so'i 'dod gzhung 'dzin pa yong re 'khrul //
NK036(chi)013:291: zhes pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed cing don bstan par bya'o //
NK036(chi)013:292: de nas ngo sprad pa ni /
NK036(chi)013:293: rgyab yig nas me long gsum gyi dbyings mtshon pa ste /
NK036(chi)013:294: me long gsum gyi nang du rma bya'i mdongs bstan
NK036(chi)013:295: te dbang rdzogs pa'i dus na res mos kyis gtad
NK036(chi)013:296: la / dang po sprul pa'i dbyings dang rang rig pa ngo sprad /
NK036(chi)013:298: gsum pa chos kyi sku'i dbyings dang rig pa la ngo sprad do //
NK036(chi)013:299: 'di'i dus na dpe du ma la brten nas grol ba yin te /
NK036(chi)013:300: ngo sprad nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs par bya zhes gsungs pas /
NK036(chi)013:301: ngo sprad gzhan rnams par rgyas par ma grub kyang /
NK036(chi)013:302: gsum po ni phyi'i dbyings nam mkha' /
NK036(chi)013:303: nang gi dbyings rnam dag sgron ma //
NK036(chi)013:304: don gyi dbyings chos sku spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba ste /
NK036(chi)013:305: dpe me long g.ya' dag pa la gzugs brnyan thams cad 'char yang ma gos pa bzhin du /
NK036(chi)013:306: sems kyi dbyings chos sku me long lta bu la
NK036(chi)013:307: 'khor 'das thams cad snang zhing 'char yang ma gos
NK036(chi)013:308: shing 'gyur ba med pa'i don yin la /
NK036(chi)013:309: rtags phyi nang gi dbyings gnyis yin no //
NK036(chi)013:310: dbyings chos sku ngo bo'i ngo sprod do //
NK036(chi)013:311: gnyis pa ni dpe me long du rma bya'i mdongs
NK036(chi)013:312: gsal ba ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa ltar
NK036(chi)013:313: / don chos sku'i dbyings na rig pa rang byung
NK036(chi)013:314: gi ye shes gsal ba longs sku'i ngo bo sku
NK036(chi)013:315: dang thig le sgra 'od zer dang bcas pa sems
NK036(chi)013:316: can thams cad la gnas te /
NK036(chi)013:317: gnas par rang byung tsit+ta'i dkyil //
NK036(chi)013:318: zhal phyag rdzogs pa bum sku'i tshul //
NK036(chi)013:319: gsal la ma 'dres ngo bo nyid //
NK036(chi)013:320: lam ni rtsa bzhi 'gyur byed rlung //
NK036(chi)013:321: 'char byed sgo ni mig gnyis so //
NK036(chi)013:322: zhes gsungs pa rtags dang bcas pa da gzod mngon du 'gyur ro //
NK036(chi)013:323: gsum pa thugs rje 'gag pa med pa sprul pa'i sku'i snang lugs ni /
NK036(chi)013:324: dpe shel dri ma med pa ras dkar po la
NK036(chi)013:325: sogs pa kha dog gang gi steng du bzhag pa
NK036(chi)013:326: de ltar snang ba yang shel la 'gyur ba med
NK036(chi)013:327: pa de ltar / sprul sku'i gdul bya'i dbang gis
NK036(chi)013:328: sna tshogs su snang yang thugs rje bya ba sgrub
NK036(chi)013:329: pa'i ngo bo la 'gyur ba med do //
NK036(chi)013:330: rtags ni tshogs drug sna tshogs su snang ya nga
NK036(chi)013:331: rnam rig gsal la 'gag med du bzhugs pa yin
NK036(chi)013:332: no // de ni sku gsum gyi ngo sprod dang
NK036(chi)013:333: dbyings rig pa'i gnas lugs ngo bo rang bzhin thugs
NK036(chi)013:336: nyi shu rtsa gcig po byed na gzhan du shes so //
NK036(chi)013:339: de nas sgra'i bye brag sna tshogs pas /
NK036(chi)013:340: mkha' 'gro chos skyong la gtor ma btang /
NK036(chi)013:341: longs spyod spel ba'i phyir tshogs kyi ston mo bya /
NK036(chi)013:343: de nas slob dpon gyis skye ba med pa'i rlung sems kyi gdams ngag bstan la /
NK036(chi)013:344: bsam gtan bsgom du bzhug go //
NK036(chi)013:345: spros pa med pa'i dbang bskur ba /
NK036(chi)013:346: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa dang /
NK036(chi)013:347: de'i rgyab yig phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa rtsa dang thig le dag par byed pa'i dbang /
NK036(chi)013:348: rang byung rdo rjes bsdus pa rdzogs so //
NK036(chi)013:349: 'di la zhang ston pa rnams kyis spros bcas bsres pa gcig yod mod kyi /
NK036(chi)013:353: sdom bzung rnams gzhan dang 'dra bas 'dir ma bris /
NK036(chi)013:354: me long rma bya'i shel gyi ngo sprod 'di dgos
